text: Voices from Chernobyl () is a 2016 Luxembourgian Austrian Belarusian Ukrainian documentary movie directed by Pol Cruchten and was based on the 1997 oral history novel by Svetlana Alexievitch. ==Other websites== * Category:2016 documentary movies Category:2010s Luxembourgian movies Category:Luxembourgian documentary movies Category:Austrian documentary movies Category:Belarusian movies Category:Ukrainian movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Pol Cruchten Category:Movies set in Ukraine Category:Movies about nuclear accidents
title: Voices from Chernobyl (movie)
